00019 #define _WIN32_IE 0x0600
00020 
00021 #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN             // Exclude rarely-used stuff from Windows headers
00022 
00023 #include "resource.h"
00024 
00025 #include <winsock2.h>
00026 #include <windows.h>
00027 #include <shellapi.h>
00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 
00030 #include "NotifyWindowClass.h"
00031 #include "Ping.h"
00032 #include "PingException.h"
00033 #include "TrayIcon.h"
00034 #include "TrayIconException.h"
00035 
00036 CPing* ping;
00037 HINSTANCE myInstance;
00038 HICON m_hIconUp;
00039 HICON m_hIconDown;
00040 char pszToolTip[255] = {0};
00041 HMENU hSubMenu;
00042 TrayIcon* trayIcon;
00043 
00044 LRESULT CALLBACK About(HWND hDlg, UINT message, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
00045 {
00046         switch (message)
00047         {
00048                 case WM_INITDIALOG:
00049                                 return TRUE;
00050 
00051                 case WM_COMMAND:
00052                         if (LOWORD(wParam) == IDOK || LOWORD(wParam) == IDCANCEL) 
00053                         {
00054                                 EndDialog(hDlg, LOWORD(wParam));
00055                                 return TRUE;
00056                         }
00057                         break;
00058         }
00059     return FALSE;
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 LRESULT CALLBACK MyWindowProc(HWND hWnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
00064 {
00065         char buf[255] = {0};
00066         int num;
00067 
00068         if (msg == TrayIcon::WM_PING_TASKBAR_CREATED)
00069         {
00070                 trayIcon->setIcon(ping->isUp() ? m_hIconUp : m_hIconDown);
00071                 return 0;
00072         }
00073 
00074         switch (msg)
00075         {
00076         case WM_COMMAND:
00077                 switch (LOWORD(wParam))
00078                 {
00079                 case ID_TRAYMENU_QUIT:
00080                         // end program;
00081                         ping->stop();
00082                         try
00083                         {
00084                                 trayIcon->remove();
00085                         }
00086                         catch (const TrayIconException& e)
00087                         {
00088                                 MessageBox(NULL, "Failed to remove tray icon", "Error", MB_OK);
00089                         }
00090                         DestroyWindow(hWnd);
00091                         return 0;
00092                 case ID_TRAYMENU_PINGHOST:
00093                         switch (GetMenuState(hSubMenu, ID_TRAYMENU_PINGHOST, MF_BYCOMMAND))
00094                         {
00095                         case MF_CHECKED:
00096                                 ping->stop();
00097                                 num = CheckMenuItem(hSubMenu, ID_TRAYMENU_PINGHOST, MF_BYCOMMAND | MF_UNCHECKED);
00098                                 break;
00099                         case MF_UNCHECKED:
00100                                 ping->start();
00101                                 num = CheckMenuItem(hSubMenu, ID_TRAYMENU_PINGHOST, MF_BYCOMMAND | MF_CHECKED);
00102                         default:
00103                                 break;
00104                         } 
00105                         return 0;
00106                 case ID_TRAYMENU_ABOUT:
00107                         DialogBox(myInstance, (LPCTSTR)IDD_ABOUT, hWnd, (DLGPROC)About);
00108                 default:
00109                         return DefWindowProc(hWnd, msg, wParam, lParam);
00110                 }
00111         case CPing::PING_HOST_UP:
00112         case CPing::PING_HOST_DOWN:
00113                 try 
00114                 {
00115                         trayIcon->setIcon(
00116                                         msg == CPing::PING_HOST_UP ? m_hIconUp : m_hIconDown);
00117                         num = sprintf(buf, "Host \"%s\" is %s", 
00118                                         ((CPing*)wParam)->getHostName(), 
00119                                         msg == CPing::PING_HOST_UP ? "up" : "down");
00120                         trayIcon->setInfo(buf);
00121                 }
00122                 catch (const TrayIconException& e)
00123                 {
00124                         MessageBox(NULL, "Failed to change status icon", "Error", MB_OK);
00125                 }
00126                 return 0;
00127         case WM_USER + 0x5000:
00128                 switch (LOWORD(lParam))
00129                 {
00130                 case WM_RBUTTONUP:
00131                         POINT pos;
00132                         GetCursorPos(&pos);
00133                         SetForegroundWindow(hWnd);
00134                         TrackPopupMenu(hSubMenu, 0, pos.x, pos.y, 0, hWnd, NULL);
00135                         PostMessage(hWnd, WM_NULL, 0, 0);
00136                         break;
00137                 }
00138                 return 0;
00139         case WM_DESTROY:
00140                 PostQuitMessage(0);
00141                 return 0;
00142         default:
00143                 return DefWindowProc(hWnd, msg, wParam, lParam);
00144         }
00145 }
00146 
00147 int APIENTRY WinMain(HINSTANCE hInstance,
00148                      HINSTANCE hPrevInstance,
00149                      LPSTR     lpCmdLine,
00150                      int       nCmdShow)
00151 {
00152         WSADATA wsaData;
00153         int num;
00154 
00155         // Initialise Winsock library
00156         WSAStartup(MAKEWORD(2,2), &wsaData);
00157 
00158         CNotifyWindowClass wndClass(hInstance, (WNDPROC) MyWindowProc);
00159         HWND hWnd;
00160         int bRet;
00161         MSG msg;
00162 
00163         myInstance = hInstance;
00164 
00165         if (!wndClass.registerClass())
00166         {
00167                 MessageBox(NULL, "Could not register window class for window", "Error", MB_OK);
00168                 return 1;
00169         }
00170 
00171         hWnd = CreateWindow(CNotifyWindowClass::sc_lpszClassName, "", WS_POPUP,
00172                 CW_USEDEFAULT, CW_USEDEFAULT,
00173                 CW_USEDEFAULT, CW_USEDEFAULT,
00174                 NULL, 0,
00175                 hInstance, 0);
00176 
00177         if (hWnd == NULL)
00178         {
00179                 MessageBox(NULL, "Error while creating window", "Error", MB_OK);
00180                 return 1;
00181         }
00182 
00183         m_hIconDown = ::LoadIcon(hInstance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDI_ICON_DOWN));
00184         m_hIconUp = ::LoadIcon(hInstance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDI_ICON_UP));
00185 
00186         HMENU hMenu = LoadMenu(myInstance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDR_MENU1));
00187         hSubMenu = GetSubMenu(hMenu, 0);
00188         SetMenuDefaultItem(hSubMenu, ID_TRAYMENU_QUIT, FALSE);
00189 
00190         trayIcon = new TrayIcon(hWnd, WM_USER + 0x5000);
00191 
00192         try
00193         {
00194                 trayIcon->setIcon(m_hIconUp);
00195                 OutputDebugString("Set icon");
00196                 trayIcon->setVersion();
00197                 OutputDebugString("Set version");
00198                 ping = new CPing(hWnd, lpCmdLine, true);
00199 
00200                 num = sprintf(pszToolTip, "TrayAlive for host %s", ping->getHostName());
00201                 trayIcon->setToolTip(pszToolTip);
00202                 OutputDebugString("Set tooltip");
00203                 ping->start();
00204                 OutputDebugString("Ping started");
00205 
00206                 while ((bRet = GetMessage(&msg, NULL, 0, 0)) != 0)
00207                 {
00208                         if (bRet == -1)
00209                         {
00210                         }
00211                         else
00212                         {
00213                                 TranslateMessage(&msg);
00214                                 DispatchMessage(&msg);
00215                         }
00216                 }
00217 
00218                 delete ping;
00219                 delete trayIcon;
00220         }
00221         catch (const CPingException& e)
00222         {
00223                 MessageBox(NULL, e.what(), "Error", MB_OK);
00224                 delete trayIcon;
00225         }
00226         catch (const TrayIconException& tie)
00227         {
00228                 MessageBox(NULL, tie.what(), "Error", MB_OK);
00229                 if (trayIcon != NULL)
00230                 {
00231                         delete trayIcon;
00232                 }
00233         }
00234 
00235         WSACleanup();
00236         return 0;
00237 }
